item.title: APSB24-66: Security update available for Adobe Photoshop
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Photoshop. These updates resolve critical vulnerabilities that could lead to arbitrary code execution.
Products: Adobe Photoshop 2024, Adobe Photoshop 2023 Severity: Critical
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/photoshop/apsb24-66.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
